verses.1: Sanggamte aw, tu-in note lak mah bangin mun dangah zong Topaʼ thu manlang takin kizel pakin lungdam takin a kisan theih nadingin kote ading thu hong ngetsak un.
verses.2: Mi khempeuh in thu um nai lo uh ahih manin a gilo a siahuai mite panin Pasian in kote hong hotkhiat nadingin zong hong ngetsak un.
verses.3: Note ahihleh, Topa citak mahmah ahih manin hong thahatsak dinga, A Gilopa kiang panin hong hon khia ding hi.
verses.4: Note kiangah kong gen uh thute a kipat cil a kipanin na zuih uh mah bangin zui paisuak taktak ding, ci-in note muanna lungsim kote sungah Topa in hong guan hi.
verses.5: Pasian bangin itna nei-in Khris thuak bangin na thuak zawh nadingun Topa in note lungsim hong bawlsak tahen.
verses.6: Sanggamte aw, i Topa Jesu Khris min tawh kong sawl nop uh thu panin: Note tungah ka hong hilh sa uh thute a zui lo, a thadah gamtat thu up pih mite tawh na kikhawl kei un.
verses.7: Koteʼ gamtatzia bangin a gamta ding na hihna uh teltakin na thei uh hi. Note tawh ka hong om khawm lai-un ka thadah om kei uh hi.
verses.8: Kuama an a khongin ka ne kei uh hi. Note khat peuhpeuh in nong suplawh khak loh nadingun a sun a zanin hahkat takin na ka sem uh hi.
verses.9: Hih bangin ka gamtatna uh pen noteʼ hong piakte a khongin ne-in a zang dingin a kilawm mah hi napi-in, noteʼ etteh ding gamtatzia a hong lak ka hizaw uh hi.
verses.10: Note tawh ka hong om khawm lai-un, “Na a sem nuam lo mi peuhmah an nesak kei un,” ci-in kong gen uh hi.
verses.11: Hih bangin thu ka hong genna uh pen note lakah mi pawl khatte thadahin na sem nuam lo uh a, midangteʼ nasepna va nawngkaisak zawsop hi, ci-in ka zakna hang uh ahi hi.
verses.12: Tu-in tua bang mite in kuamah nawngkaisak nawn loin manmanin na sem hiathiatin amauʼ nuntak nadingun na a sep nadingun Topa Jesu Khris min tawh hanthawnin thu kong pia uh hi.
verses.13: Sanggamte aw, note in a hoihin gamtat ding na cimtak ngei het kei ta un.
verses.14: Hih lai sunga ka hong gente uh a zui nuam lo mi khatpeuh a om leh tua mipa limtakin ciamteh unla, amah a maizum theih nadingin kikholh pih nawn kei un.
verses.15: Ahi zongin amah galbawl kei unla, thu up pih mi khat hihna tawh hilh bawl zaw un.
verses.16: Eite tungah nopsakna a hong pia thei Topa in note tungah a tawntungin nopsakna hong pia henla, amah in note khempeuh hong ompih tahen.
verses.17: Keimah Paul in kong hopih hi, cihna kammal teng keima khut tawh ka hong gelh ahi hi. Keima laikhak khempeuh hih bangzia-in ciamtehin ka hih ngeina ahi hi.
verses.18: I Topa Jesu Khris hong hehpihna thupha note khempeuh tungah hong tung tahen.
